casebody.data:
WILLIAMS
v.
HOMEQ SERVICING CORP. No. 382A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2008. John F. Bloss, Greensboro, for Williams.

Prior report: 184 N.C.App. 413, 646 S.E.2d 381.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of March 2008 by Defendant to Withdraw Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of April 2008."
